_sText:
# Fabric - Bomb/Defuse
# V. 1.5 Final



## >>>> EN:

### >> About map:
The game takes place in an abandoned storage of washers and dryers in Africa, which is threatened by the earthquake.
Terrorists goal: Kill counter-terrorists, bomb transformer (Bombsite A) or storage of washing machines (Bombsite B).
Counter-Terrorists goal: Kill terrorists, or keep them from bombing.
Map by: nkpkiller / 2012 , POLAND

### >> Installation:
Unpack files: de_fabric.bsp, de_fabric.nav, de_fabric.txt to "cstrike/maps/" directory. Then just select map when starting new game server and play!



## >>>> PL:

### >> O mapie:
Gra toczy sie w opuszczonym skladowisku pralek i suszarek w Afryce, ktore jest zagrozone trzesieniem ziemi. Terrorysci postanawiaja to wykorzystac i zniszczyc magazyny.
Cel Terrorystow: Zabic antyterrorystow, zbombardowac transformator (Bombsite A) lub magazyn pralek (Bombsite B).
Cel Antyterrorystow: Zabic terrorystow lub powstrzymac ich przed bombardowaniem.
Autor: nkpkiller / 2012 , POLSKA

### >> Sposob instalacji mapy:
Rozpakuj pliki z archiwum: de_fabric.bsp, de_fabric.nav, de_fabric.txt do katalogu "cstrike/maps/". Potem wybierz w grze w czasie uruchamiania serwera mape i graj!



## >>>> Other notes (EN): 
This is my first map uploaded on gamebanana. I hope it will be everything OK.
> Compiled with HDR, Cubemaps, Static prop lighting, Prop detail model shadows (NOT prop collision model shadows).
> There are also graphic HUD radar support.
